file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2 info: contact: email: support@phoenixnap.com name: PhoenixNAP Team url: https://phoenixnap.com/ description: | Public IP blocks are a set of contiguous IPs that allow you to access your servers or networks from the internet. Use the IP Addresses API to request and delete IP blocks.

Knowledge base articles to help you can be found here

All URLs are relative to (https://api.phoenixnap.com/ips/v1/) license: name: Apache 2.0 url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html termsOfService: https://phoenixnap.com/infrastructure-solutions/legal-it/privacy-shield-compliant-privacy-policy title: IP Addresses API version: "1.0" servers: - url: https://api.phoenixnap.com/ips/v1 security: - OAuth2: - bmc - bmc.read tags: - description: Public IP Block operations. name: IP Blocks paths: /ip-blocks: get: description: List all IP Blocks. operationId: ipBlocksGet parameters: - description: "List of tags, in the form tagName.tagValue, to filter by." example: - env.dev - loc.phx explode: true in: query name: tag required: false schema: items: type: string type: array style: form responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlock' type: array description: IP Blocks list. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc.read summary: List IP Blocks. tags: - IP Blocks post: description: Request an IP Block. An IP Block is a set of contiguous IPs that can be assigned to other resources such as servers. operationId: ipBlocksPost requestBody: content: application/json: example: cidrBlockSize: /28 location: PHX description: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlockCreate' responses: "201": content: application/json: example: id: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 cidr: 1.1.1.0/28 location: PHX cidrBlockSize: /28 status: unassigned description: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." isBringYourOwn: false createdOn: 2021-03-13T20:24:32.491Z schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlock' description: IP Block created. "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to wrong data. Please check the provided parameters and try again. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "406": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: No server available of type server.type. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc summary: Create an IP Block. tags: - IP Blocks /ip-blocks/{ipBlockId}: delete: description: Delete an IP Block. An IP Block can only be deleted if not assigned to any resource. operationId: ipBlocksIpBlockIdDelete parameters: - description: The IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 explode: false in: path name: ipBlockId required: true schema: type: string style: simple responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeleteIpBlockResult' description: IP Block deleted. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc summary: Delete IP Block. tags: - IP Blocks get: description: Get IP Block. operationId: ipBlocksIpBlockIdGet parameters: - description: The IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 explode: false in: path name: ipBlockId required: true schema: type: string style: simple responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlock' description: Specific IP Block details. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc.read summary: Get IP Block. tags: - IP Blocks patch: description: Update IP Block's details. operationId: ipBlocksIpBlockIdPatch parameters: - description: The IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 explode: false in: path name: ipBlockId required: true schema: type: string style: simple requestBody: content: application/json: example: description: Ip Block description schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlockPatch' responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlock' description: Updated IpBlock. "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to wrong data. Please check the provided parameters and try again. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "404": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since the resource could not been found. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc summary: Update IP block. tags: - IP Blocks /ip-blocks/{ipBlockId}/tags: put: description: Overwrites tags assigned for IP Block and unassigns any tags not part of the request. operationId: ipBlocksIpBlockIdTagsPut parameters: - description: The IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 explode: false in: path name: ipBlockId required: true schema: type: string style: simple requestBody: content: application/json: schema: example: - name: stage value: beta - name: group value: discountId items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/TagAssignmentRequest' type: array responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/IpBlock' description: IP Blocks tags set. "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to wrong data. Please check the provided parameters and try again. "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. "403": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. "500": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. security: - OAuth2: - bmc summary: Overwrite tags assigned for IP Block. tags: - IP Blocks components: parameters: ipBlockIdPathParam: description: The IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 explode: false in: path name: ipBlockId required: true schema: type: string style: simple responses: Unauthorized: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to invalid credentials. Please check the provided credentials and try again. Forbidden: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since this resource cannot be accessed by the provided credentials. InternalServerError: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. BadRequest: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed due to wrong data. Please check the provided parameters and try again. NotAccepted: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: No server available of type server.type. NotFound: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: The request failed since the resource could not been found. schemas: IpBlockPatch: description: IP Block patch. example: description: Ip Block allocation. properties: description: description: The description of the Ip Block. example: Ip Block allocation. maxLength: 250 type: string type: object IpBlockCreate: description: IP Block Request. example: description: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." location: PHX cidrBlockSize: /30 tags: - name: stage value: beta - name: group value: discounted properties: location: description: "IP Block location ID. Currently this field should be set to\ \ `PHX`, `ASH`, `SGP`, `NLD`, `CHI`, `SEA` or `AUS`." example: PHX type: string cidrBlockSize: description: "CIDR IP Block Size. Currently this field should be set to\ \ either `/31`, `/30`, `/29` or `/28`. For a larger Block Size contact\ \ support." example: /30 type: string description: description: The description of the IP Block. example: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." maxLength: 250 type: string tags: description: "Tags to set to ip-block, if any." example: - name: stage value: beta - name: group value: discounted items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/TagAssignmentRequest' type: array required: - cidrBlockSize - location type: object IpBlock: description: IP Block Details. example: description: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." isBringYourOwn: false location: PHX cidr: 1.1.1.0/31 id: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 assignedResourceId: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 assignedResourceType: server createdOn: 2021-03-13T20:24:32.491Z cidrBlockSize: /30 status: unassigned tags: - name: stage value: beta - name: group value: discounted properties: id: description: IP Block identifier. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 type: string location: description: "IP Block location ID. Currently this field should be set to\ \ `PHX`, `ASH`, `SGP`, `NLD`, `CHI`, `SEA` or `AUS`." example: PHX type: string cidrBlockSize: description: "CIDR IP Block Size. Currently this field should be set to\ \ either `/31`, `/30`, `/29`, `/28`, `/27`, `/26`, `/25`, `/24`, `/23`\ \ or `/22`." example: /30 type: string cidr: description: The IP Block in CIDR notation. example: 1.1.1.0/31 type: string status: description: The status of the IP Block. example: unassigned type: string assignedResourceId: description: ID of the resource assigned to the IP Block. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 type: string assignedResourceType: description: Type of the resource assigned to the IP Block. example: server type: string description: description: The description of the IP Block. example: "IP Block #1 used for publicly accessing server #1." maxLength: 250 type: string tags: description: The tags assigned if any. example: - name: stage value: beta - name: group value: discounted items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/TagAssignment' type: array isBringYourOwn: description: True if the IP block is a `bring your own` block. example: false type: boolean createdOn: description: Date and time when the IP block was created. example: 2021-03-13T20:24:32.491Z format: date-time type: string required: - cidr - cidrBlockSize - createdOn - id - isBringYourOwn - location - status type: object DeleteIpBlockResult: description: Result of a successful delete action. example: result: IP Block has been deleted. ipBlockId: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 properties: result: description: IP Block has been deleted. example: IP Block has been deleted. type: string ipBlockId: description: The unique identifier of the IP Block. example: 6047127fed34ecc3ba8402d2 type: string required: - ipBlockId - result type: object TagAssignment: description: Tag assigned to resource. properties: id: description: The unique id of the tag. example: 60ffafcdffb8b074c7968dad type: string name: description: The name of the tag. example: Environment type: string value: description: The value of the tag assigned to the resource. example: PROD type: string isBillingTag: description: Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices example: true type: boolean createdBy: description: Who the tag was created by. enum: - USER - SYSTEM type: string required: - id - isBillingTag - name type: object Error: properties: message: description: The description detailing the cause of the error code. readOnly: true type: string validationErrors: description: "Validation errors, if any." items: type: string readOnly: true type: array required: - message type: object TagAssignmentRequest: description: Tag request to assign to resource. example: name: Environment value: PROD properties: name: description: "The name of the tag. Tag names are case-sensitive, and should\ \ be composed of a maximum of 100 characters including UTF-8 Unicode letters,\ \ numbers, and the following symbols: '-', '_'. Regex: [A-zÀ-ú0-9_-]{1,100}." example: Environment type: string value: description: "The value of the tag assigned to the resource. Tag values\ \ are case-sensitive, and should be composed of a maximum of 100 characters\ \ including UTF-8 Unicode letters, numbers, and the following symbols:\ \ '-', '_'. Regex: [A-zÀ-ú0-9_-]{1,100}." example: PROD type: string required: - name type: object securitySchemes: OAuth2: flows: clientCredentials: scopes: bmc: Grants full access to bmc-api. bmc.read: Grants read only access to bmc-api. tokenUrl: https://auth.phoenixnap.com/auth/realms/BMC/protocol/openid-connect/token type: oauth2

Error: notImplemented: path "/ip-blocks": get: security: security "OAuth2" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
